duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify top IT Talent to fulfill client needs
Increase sales and market share through assigned and newly generated accounts
Develop and manage new and existing customer relationships
Contact and meet with prospective customers to establish customer needs and hiring cycles
Prepare and present sales information and effective proposals for customers

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree OR Military experience OR Associates Degree with 3 years of professional experience OR 4 years of professional experience
